sqlMap.statement:
SELECT MD.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,MD.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT AS MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXTã€€ ,MD.THIS_MTH_TOT_STD_COST_AMT AS THIS_MTH_TOT_STD_COST_AMT ,MD.RTRN_REQ_PRT_FLG AS RTRN_REQ_PRT_FLG ,MD.MDSE_ITEM_TP_CD AS MDSE_ITEM_TP_CD ,'' AS FILL_1_TXT ,'' AS FILL_12_TXT FROM MDSE MD WHERE MD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
#mdseItemTpCd[]#
ORDER BY MD.MDSE_CD ASC
